Filters Views¶

class filters.views.StorletData(**kwargs)¶

Upload or get a storlet data.

filters.views.dependency_detail(*args, **kwargs)¶

Retrieve, update or delete a Dependency.

filters.views.dependency_list(*args, **kwargs)¶

List all dependencies, or create a Dependency.

filters.views.filter_deploy(*args, **kwargs)¶

Deploy a filter to a specific swift account.

filters.views.filter_undeploy(*args, **kwargs)¶

Undeploy a storlet from a specific swift account.

filters.views.save_file(file_, path='')¶

Little helper to save a file

filters.views.storlet_detail(*args, **kwargs)¶

Retrieve, update or delete a Storlet.

filters.views.storlet_list(*args, **kwargs)¶

List all storlets, or create a new storlet.

filters.views.storlet_list_deployed(*args, **kwargs)¶

List all the storlets deployed.
